title: All-Party Parliamentary Group on Leasehold and Commonhold Reform
purpose: To consider matters relating to leasehold and commonhold legislation and regulation. Reduce opportunities for exploitation and improve cladding. Review the leasehold property Tribunal as a low-cost forum for disputes and redress including leasehold insurance and service charges which fall outside FCA (Financial Conduct Authority) regulation. Meet with and monitor government departments and publicly funded bodies working on leasehold.
